title: Why is Billie Eilish so beautiful? - Quora

response.answer_text: WHAT????? I hear people coming at Billie saying oh she’s ugly, oh she’s not even cute like I’m confused??  Anyone who thinks Billie isn’t the beautiful queen she is just back off. The thing is you see all these fake people and say oh she’s pretty, but guess what those are people are fake. Billie is herself and doesn’t care what you think about her and if she’s cute or not. Noo she’s just naturally beautiful and doesn’t try to flaunt it.   If you still don’t think she’s pretty I just don’t even know what to say.

well, the answer is simple, because every human god has put onto this earth is beautiful and billie eilish pirate baird oconnell is as beautiful. you can come at me and say “her music is overrated” or “she’s overrated” even though saying that is so irrelevant. anyways she’s the most beautiful girl I have ever seen in my life. she may be basic to some people but does she have to be different from everyone else? no. here are some pictures of her. they all are amazing.      this here is billie eilish.     goodbye & thank you.
